name: Holocene Harbinger (WIP)
description:
Holocene Harbinger is a fast-paced 2D platformer about a murdered king who has come back from the dead to fulfill the prophecy he was granted during his death.

This is a very early build of this project - none of the sound or art assets are anywhere near their final form.

Please let me know how the player controller and level design feels!  I am trying to capture similar feelings to Celeste: death occurs often but is never a major set back.  Some levels will take multiple tries but you will eventually persist!

WASD to move.

SPACE to jump.

Click after obtaining a battery to fire an EMP blast to temporarily stun enemies.

SHIFT to sprint, once you find the powerup, that is ;).
